name: Talysis II {thêta}
description: A software simulation of analogue video feedback creates complexity from an economy of means (a single square is recursed around a loop with transformations along the way). The strict symmetries and quasi-hyperbolic tessellations allude to works of the Perceptual and Op-Art movements of the 1960’s. → Artwork by @MrPrudence → Originally for Art.ficial Emotion, Sao Paulo, Brazil, 2007
